talk_0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You should now be able to Autobuild <clr:0000>an
additional design<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>Please wait while I prepare the necessary
parts for you to test this <clr:0000>schema stone<clr:ffff>.
talk_0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Thank you for driving out the trespassers.
I will no longer need to hide in order to
avoid detection.<sp:0:4:0>There is another reason that it is good
you have come.<sp:0:4:0>I see that you have the ability to
Autobuild. That means this <clr:0000>schema
stone<clr:ffff> I carry is for you.
talk_0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Schema stones can help you to <clr:0000>build
things you have never before imagined<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I hope that you find this one useful.
